name: fCM.js
introduction: Modeling Tool with Design-Time Support for Fragment-Based Case Management.

sections.title: Goal of the project
sections.content: It aims at supporting users at design time by providing a joint, visual user interface for all artifacts and by integrating automated guideline checking based on fCM guidelines.

sections.title: My work
sections.content: We added a execution interface to the tool, which allows users to execute their models and see the results in real-time.

sections.title: Future
sections.content: In the future, we want to export and import Object Centric Event Logs.
